name: Out Of A-Line [DEMO]
description:
Demo made during NaNoReno 2021

Out of A-Line is a visual novel on development.

In this demo, you can choose between two different characters to play as, Aledis and Allen; both of them have three different outfits to choose from. You will get to know all the characters available to build relationships with.✨

This demo includes:

  • Languages: English and Spanish.
  • Meeting a varied cast of six LGBTQ+ characters.
  • Choosing your protagonist, each with a different career path.
  • Make two choices per protagonist, both of them meaningful for the full game.
  • 6k+ words, fully translated in English and Spanish.
  • Differents scripts per protagonist.
  • Nine full colored backgrounds, one for each place you visit.

Although the demo is a bit short, (as it is our first time developing a game), we have many things planned for the full game (that might or might not be commercial), such as:

  • At least two routes per character.
  • Diversity of relationships to build (such as friendship, workmates, and romantic, including polyromantic ones).
  • Minigames.
  • Full color CGs.
  • An OST.
  • An optional NSFW version of the game. (Paid)
  • And more!

Follow us on twitter to know more about the development ✨@LucisTriadGames
